name: XDA-Developers 2021 / Lemon Chiffon Classic Mix
description: A mix of the early Classic (Yellow theme) and the XDA 2021 theme. Especially suited to those who don't like super bright themes and prefer a a more mellow background. By editing you can easily change from yellow shades to any color of your choice. For lovers of the past, but who want all the features of the new! Also removes the right side panel.
additional_info:
For maximum effect choose the 2021 Classic theme on the XDA forums using the theme changer button extreme bottom left of forum pages. 

Also ensure this stylish theme is activated by ticking it using the stylish (or newer Stylus) icon in your browser toolbar.You'll Need Stylish or Stylus installed on your Firefox / Chrome browser and you'll need to install this theme as an style to use with XDA.

Unlike previous version that changed the layout at XDA, this one just changes colors and removes right side bar. That said if you practice a bit of CSS you can change pretty much anything you like using Stylish/Stylus, or even Stylebot for Chrome.
